eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}\displaystyle
s & = & p_{1\parallel}^2 = p_{2\parallel}^2  \\
t & = & (p_1 + p_2)^2 = (p_{1\perp} + p_{2 \perp})^2\,.

\begin{eqnarray}\displaystyle\label{67}
 |W \rangle & \equiv &
\int dk \sum_i |k, i \rangle \; \frac{\delta(k^2/2+ 2 l(i))}{2

\langle k, i |\, (b_0 + \bar b_0) | {\cal{B}}^{p-1} \rangle_{|z| =1} \\

(b_0 + \bar b_0) |{\cal{B}}^{p-1} \rangle_{|z| =1} \, \nonumber .

\

(b_0 + \bar b_0) \,
 | \widetilde {\cal{B}}^{p-1} \rangle_{|z| =1} \, \,.
